Art. 4.123. 
Limited recovery
The takeover may be limited to part of the farm. In this case, the interested party designates the assets that he is taking over without prejudice to his co-heirs. In the event of a dispute, the competent court will decide.
 In the order of subsequent priorities, the right of repossession may be exercised over the remaining assets. If there is more than one assignee in the same category, they shall jointly designate the assets they are acquiring.
